ComicInfo.Title: The Dog of War Part 1
ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - The Dog of War
ComicInfo.Summary: The Dog of War Part 1: Sisko and Odo investigate when they discover alien technology in one of Quark's holosuites, and learn that Quark is in the possession of a rare purebred Corgi that he has acquired for a buyer, and also an unknonwn alien device that contains Borg technology.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 06:07:25. [CVDB981634] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:47:35. [Issue ID 2515402]
ComicInfo.Characters: Quark's mystery contact,Captain Pearl,Lt. Commander Jadzia Dax,Admiral William Ross,Latinum (a dog),Captain Benjamin Sisko,Chief Miles O'Brien,Jake Sisko,Jennifer Sisko (flashback),Commander T'Lith,Morn,Dr. Julian Bashir,Constable Odo,Elim Garak,Lt. Commander Worf,Vic Fontaine (hologram),Lt. Reginald Barclay (flashback),Locutus of Borg [Captain Jean-Luc Picard] (flashback),Major Kira Nerys,Quark,Dr. Kortar
ComicInfo.Teams: United Federation of Planets,Deep Space Nine Crew,Starfleet
